This is seen as effective through the legalisation policies of Portugal https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Drug_policy_of_Portugal

Norway
https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Drug_liberalization#Norway
attributes.background: Laws against Drugs are dangerous for society. They do not prevent people from gaining access to drugs and they also make it easy for dangerous drugs to be circulated. By legalising drugs this country will experience a sharp downturn in gang violence and will reduce deaths from poorly made drugs.
